messages: 97800b12618e32d2e5ee54cbdb9f25fa (10:18): hm now.. I have to learn how to render text!
145d509326c301bbb94ab2f6a8e3d726 (10:26): When in the hell did updating blender get to be such a pain in the ass?
6449fe7cf4ea600183fd7724395917b8 (10:26): anybody here can to export to .pov?? I am using blender-2.41 at GNU/Linux. I get this error: http://rafb.net/paste/results/NuuZen16.html
02e08f381a12d3947303164df6615613 (10:26): Raseri, since people started switching to linux
145d509326c301bbb94ab2f6a8e3d726 (10:27): I've been using linux all along...
02e08f381a12d3947303164df6615613 (10:28): no click-installers like windows or mac os, linux isnt as efficient. that's the problem
02e08f381a12d3947303164df6615613 (10:28): too many libraries that can go missing
145d509326c301bbb94ab2f6a8e3d726 (10:28): No, there are coding errors...parse errors of all things
145d509326c301bbb94ab2f6a8e3d726 (10:29): All libs are present except freealut, and I don't need the game engine
02e08f381a12d3947303164df6615613 (10:30): Raseri, strange, i dont see those problems using windows ;)
145d509326c301bbb94ab2f6a8e3d726 (10:30): There's a lot of things you don't see using windows...
145d509326c301bbb94ab2f6a8e3d726 (10:31): But I'm really not here to argue about operating systems...
02e08f381a12d3947303164df6615613 (10:31): Raseri, me either, especailly since i still have a place for linux...that place jsut isn't my laptop though, lol
145d509326c301bbb94ab2f6a8e3d726 (10:32): The difference is that I'm compiling from source while you're using binary builds (I'm assuming)
145d509326c301bbb94ab2f6a8e3d726 (10:32): So for me it's either rpm dependency hell or rewrite parts of the source myself
145d509326c301bbb94ab2f6a8e3d726 (10:33): Not that I'm not capable of doing so, I'm just not in the fscking mood for it ATM
145d509326c301bbb94ab2f6a8e3d726 (10:35): So, my problem is not actually linux, but Fedora Core, I'm thinking
145d509326c301bbb94ab2f6a8e3d726 (10:35): I was just wondering if anyone else had these problems
145d509326c301bbb94ab2f6a8e3d726 (10:36): And if anyone says "use scons" I'll gut you like a fish
02e08f381a12d3947303164df6615613 (10:38): i'd recommend #blendercompiler (or #blendercompilers) but no one ever hangs out there anymore
145d509326c301bbb94ab2f6a8e3d726 (10:39): That's because their heads all exploded with rage (they all ran FC3)
145d509326c301bbb94ab2f6a8e3d726 (10:41): Ah, well. Time to get off my ass and switch distros I guess
145d509326c301bbb94ab2f6a8e3d726 (10:44): Yeah, I've gotta start that, too..
e2b61875db20485741662517e4b9454d (10:47): Raseri: i'm using FC5 and also precompiled blender 2.42a binary builds, and no problem :)
97800b12618e32d2e5ee54cbdb9f25fa (10:48): hm how do I modify text? like extrude? moving one letter or modding one letter etc?
97800b12618e32d2e5ee54cbdb9f25fa (10:48): Dont see it here on the tut.
97800b12618e32d2e5ee54cbdb9f25fa (10:48): but.. all I get is that copyrite simple.
145d509326c301bbb94ab2f6a8e3d726 (10:49): xlordt: tab out of edit mode, hit alt-c to convert it to a curve, and alt-c again to convert to a mesh
145d509326c301bbb94ab2f6a8e3d726 (10:51): Oooo, in 6 minutes I get to watch Elephants Dream
145d509326c301bbb94ab2f6a8e3d726 (10:52): (I was on dialup until about a week ago...:P)

97800b12618e32d2e5ee54cbdb9f25fa (11:02): the flag will be... forming the part of the text that it is covering.
